data.message: This album was insane. You need to get back on that shit Em. Release Relapse 2, you probably still got song from it that could make an album. It would please your fans who liked it.

replies.message: that album was tight but he said it himself in recovery, he ran the accents into the ground, he's tearin shit up more than ever before, listen to raw, all I think about by him n royce or medicine man with dre, that's the nutty sick and twisted em everybody loves

Em only said it because critic's and fans said Relapse was trash, i'm pretty sure he find the album good actually. And objectively Relapse is better than Recovery and everything he pulled out after 2009. Beside , medicine man was wack(but that last one is only my opinion)
